selectors.l3_flows: (dest_name_aggr = "pub" AND dest_namespace = "-" AND dest_type = "net") OR (source_name_aggr = "pub" AND source_namespace = "-" AND source_type = "net")

(source_name_aggr = "pub" AND source_namespace = "-" AND source_type = "net") OR dest_namespace = "tigera-elasticsearch" OR dest_service_namespace = "tigera-elasticsearch" OR source_namespace = "kube-system" OR source_namespace = "storefront" OR source_namespace = "tigera-elasticsearch" OR source_type = "hep"
selectors.l7_flows: dest_namespace = "tigera-elasticsearch" OR dest_service_namespace = "tigera-elasticsearch" OR src_namespace = "kube-system" OR src_namespace = "storefront" OR src_namespace = "tigera-elasticsearch"
